  • Classes in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core used by ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.activities 
    Class and Description
    BaseActivity
    Extension of Activity that allows easy access to the global managers (like ListManager, FriendsManager or SyncManager.
    Friend
    Class Friend with two values: phoneNr and name
    FriendsManager
    The FriendsManager provides all information about Friends locally stored on your phone
    He knows which friend is assigned to which shoppinglist.
    Item
    Items can be stored in shopping lists
    ListManager
    The ListManager is responsible for access to all shoppinglists.
    Recipe
    Class which is used to combine different Items to a recipe
    ShoppingList
    This class represents the ShoppingList with it's attributes
    It knows nothing about the item it contains.

  • Classes in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core used by ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core 
    Class and Description
    Entity
    Base class for everything that gets stored in the SQLite database.
    Friend
    Class Friend with two values: phoneNr and name
    FriendsManager
    The FriendsManager provides all information about Friends locally stored on your phone
    He knows which friend is assigned to which shoppinglist.
    Item
    Items can be stored in shopping lists

    The ListManager is responsible for access to all shoppinglists.
    PersistenceManager
    The PersistenceManager is responsible to read and save ShoppingLists.
    Recipe
    Class which is used to combine different Items to a recipe
    Shop
    This class represents a shop Basically it holds just a name
    ShoppingList
    This class represents the ShoppingList with it's attributes
    It knows nothing about the item it contains.
